description: Ministry of Labour & Trade Union Relation - Order to appoint Mr. P. Nawaratne as the arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between Mr. Y. M. Punchibanda and Sri Lanka Transport Board - Order to appoint Mr. S. Liyanage as the arbitrator to the Industrial  Dispute  M. A. Jayantha and Sri Lanka Transport Board - Order to appoint Mr. R. S. Ariyapperuma as the arbitrator to the Industrial Dispute between P. C. B. Dissanayake and Sri Lanka Transport Board
